title: Delicious steaks
text: Found this place by putting restaurants near me in TA and was so pleased! Had the fillet steak which was so succulent and tender. Side dishes were tasty too. The home made cheesecake was great! Very reasonable price. And the staff were really friendly! Definitely recommend!

title: Great tapas
text: The atmosphere gives the restaurant an unforgettable look. The tapas here is without a doubt something to try. There was a good choice of tapas & the paella was delicious. Prices were very reasonable. The service is exceptional and the food arrived at a reasonable while. Will recommend this restaurant for everyone!!

title: Nice casual dining
text: Our experience at Beirzo was really good. Good place for pizza and salad. I do recommend this place if you are looking for quick and not expensive food. The pizza was ok, but the drink was awesome. Small and cozy place. We would come back for drinks!

title: Nice food at a good price
text: Was recommend this place by our friend, and it didn’t let down. Place was packed but the staff was very helpful. I had a grilled meat platter (steak, pork, sausage, chicken, etc.), home made fries and it was so delicious .The prices are very reasonable. Definitely going to be returning here!

title: Charming hotel with fantastic service
text: We stayed here for 5 nights and were welcomed very friendly. This is a special hotel - the terrace is one great spot with breathtaking views all around, sunset is incredible, having amazing drinks on the terrace is an experience that will never be forgotten. Pool is another great thing here - very clean and very enjoyable. I must emphasize that cleanliness in all hotel area and room is on the top level. Highly recommendable!

title: Breathtaking history and must see!
text: This is definitely a must-see. Try to book an archeologist guise in advance. Makes the event so rewarding. However, there are barricades around the major monuments... and lots of cranes due to restoration. It was still an awesome experience to view the Acropolis up close and from afar. So magical to see the theater and the city of Athens in the background.

title: Fine location
text: The hotel is in a fine location about 15 minutes from the Acropolis. It’s on the edge of the tourist area so there are lots of restaurants and stores close by. Rooms are clean, a good size and comfortable, the bathroom modern and clean. Hotel staff are very friendly and helpful! The buffet breakfast was great with big variety of products.. The wi-fi was very good.

title: Great service
text: It was beautiful experience. Stayed at a place near by and this was an amazing spot to have food. We had pork souvlaki with zucchini fries and were not disappointed! Absolutely delicious! I would definitely recommend it .. The staff were very good!

title: Nice dinner
text: Went here for dinner third night of our stay in Athens. We had the grilled/fried cheese as an entree and the moussaka which was lovely. Choices not so many but since the quality is good, if someone wants just grilled meat is totally fine! The host was great! And the prices were also nice! We paid 24€, and barely did we finish the plate. Huge portions!

title: Great meal in Athens
text: We went here in this restaurant after a week exploring Greece mainland and islands. We chose the seafood in the market, fresh shrimps, clams and octopus. Food was very tasty and very reasonably priced. The toilets were very clean and I was offered an ouzo shot free of charge .Prices are very reasonable, family run. Great place!
